test-method.name: testTC004_ExternalPONumberValidation
test-method.description: TC004: Verify validation error when External PO Number is empty

test-method.name: testTC036_MultipleFileUpload
test-method.description: TC036: Verify multiple files can be uploaded

exception.message: TC036: FAILED - APPLICATION BUG DETECTED Root Cause: File upload functionality is not working in the application Evidence: - Manual upload attempt: FAILED (files not accepted) - Automated upload: Files sent but not displayed - Expected: Uploaded files should appear in the upload area - Actual: Upload area remains empty after file selection Status: BUG REPORTED - Waiting for development fix
